statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, training_records FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'HR' AND performance_rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(training_records) > 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_type, training_date FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01' AND department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, training_type FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_type;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM training_records WHERE training_type = 'Safety Training');

SELECT employee_name, training_date, trainer_name FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT training_type, training_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_status=true;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score, observation_date FROM performance_monitoring WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hire_date ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT employee_name, trainings.training_type FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE completion_status = true
SELECT employee_id, SUM(performance_score) as total_score FROM performance_monitoring GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_score > 100
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM lean_initiatives WHERE initiative_lead = 'Alice';
SELECT review_id, review_date, reviewer_name FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, review_date, review_comments FROM employees INNER JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT record_id, training_type, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_date, performance_score FROM performance_reviews WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_type = 'Safety Training' AND completion_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY review_date ASC

SELECT employees.name, performance_reviews.performance_score FROM employees INNER JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE performance_reviews.reviewer_id = 101
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM lean_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
